Question: From May 1944 to March 1945 this person was in London and Europe.
Hints: This person then traveled alone to Spain to be photographed for the front cover of the current Life magazine piece.
This person produced most of his work between the mid-1920s and the mid-1950s, and won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1954.
Henry Louis Gates believes this person's style was fundamentally shaped "in reaction to [his] experience of world war".
